Reason for leaving
It is the policy of Olio to seek and employ the best qualified personnel and to provide equal opportunities for the advancement of employees including upgrading and training, and to conduct these activities in a manner which will not discriminate any person because of any protected characteristics, such as race, religion, national origin, color, sex, age, disability, or any consideration made unlawful by federal, state or local laws.
All offers of employment are conditioned upon satisfactory proof of the applicant's identity and legal ability to work in the U.S.
I authorize Olio and its representatives to investigate all of the information in this application, including reference inquiries concerning my employment record. I understand and agree that deliberate omission or misstatement of any of the information requested is a cause of disqualification or immediate dismissal.
I understand that nothing contained in this employment application or the granting of an interview is intended to create an employment contract between Olio and myself for either employment or for the providing of any benefit. No promises regarding employment have been made to me, and I understand that no such promise or guarantee is binding upon Olio if employed, I understand that I have a right to terminate my employment at any time with or without cause and that my employed, Olio retains a similar right and that my employer's policies and/or handbooks do not constitute an employment contract.
I understand that no employee or representative of Olio, other than its Owner & President, has the authority to change this agreement.
EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER - DRUG-FREE WORKPLACE
Signature

Location & Hours
/$
$
We are located at the heart of Dady City!
Olio is open for lunch Tuesday through Saturday from 11am to 2:30pm.and for dinner Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday from 4:30 to 9pm.
Friday and Saturdays dinner from 4:30pm to 12am.
​
Closed on Sundays and Mondays
Come visit us at Olio and enjoy our delicious Italian cuisine made with only the freshest ingredients.
Our address is 14121 7th St, Dade City, FL 33525
